synopsis.text:
Ten’yuu, a prince from the distant Zaidera Empire, arrives in Slantania on a study abroad program, but his true motive is to learn about the legendary 'Holy Maiden'. Sei Takanashi, an office worker in her twenties, was summoned to this world as the 'Saint' and has been using her love for plants to create powerful potions at the Medicinal Flora Research Institute. After months of battling monsters and being recognized as the savior of Slantania, Sei can finally focus on her research, but Ten’yuu's arrival may change everything.

Sei's reputation as the 'Holy Saint' has attracted unwanted attention from men, much to the dismay of Albert Hawke, the commander of the Third Order of Knights. Despite his displeasure, Albert's relationship with Sei is slowly evolving. As Ten’yuu delves deeper into his research, Sei must navigate the politics of the royal palace and keep her identity a secret. Will Sei and Albert finally become a couple, or will Ten’yuu's true intentions threaten their bond? Only time will tell in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
